If you fail to run "setup_xampp.bat", you need to check the VC9 run-time library.

= Details =

Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable Package (x86) :
  * http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=9B2DA534-3E03-4391-8A4D-074B9F2BC1BF
  * size: 1.7MB

Download and install it, then try "setup_xampp.bat" again.
